alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 3:40PM EST until January 26 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy rain may cause flooding. * WHERE...Rhode Island and much of eastern Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST this evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of roadways and smaller rivers or streams is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is a low risk that some locations could receive as much as 3 inches of rain. This would result in more significant flooding.
info.instruction: Heavy rain and flooded roads may affect the first part of the Thursday morning commute. Plan on extra travel time. You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk
